Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed after the execution of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and the subsequent occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined within the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-EIC Major Revision in variants where multiple revision cycles occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Reviewer Agreed and activity SW-EIC Major Revision for cases where activity SW-EIC Major Revision occurs

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and Manuscript Export Succeeded when SW-Reviewer Agreed precedes final acceptance
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be followed by another SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases with multiple reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all process variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that include reviewer invitation reminders
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Selection is now due and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Agreed measured from its immediate predecessor activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name
Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit in rejection-after-agreement scenarios
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'average'}"
